display.title: Improving Upon Potions
display.description: Using any special Root & a World Fragment (Depth) you can enhance any Potion to grant additional effects when used. Simple toss everything into a Boiling Cauldron to enhance a Potion [Required: 1x Any Root 1x World Fragment (Depth) 1x Any Potion | Drop Craft With: Boiling Cauldron]
